title: Documentation - Object storage (OBJ)
abstract:
# Documentation - Object storage (OBJ)
| Name and description                                        | Name and description.1                                        | Type         | Emit duration      | Labels                   |
|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| obj_buckets_count                                         | obj_buckets_count                                         | obj_buckets_count     | obj_buckets_count     | obj_buckets_count                |
| The number of buckets in object storage, across all tenants.                              | The number of buckets in object storage, across all tenants.                              | Gauge        | 1 m         | Not applicable                 |
| obj_objects_count                                         | obj_objects_count                                         | obj_objects_count     | obj_objects_count     | obj_objects_count                |
| The number of objects in object storage, across all tenants.                              | The number of objects in object storage, across all tenants.                              | Gauge        | 1 m         | Not applicable                 |
| obj_s3_operations_count                                       | obj_s3_operations_count                                       | obj_s3_operations_count    | obj_s3_operations_count    | obj_s3_operations_count              |
| The number of operations in object storage, sliced by instance, and whether they have succeeded.                     | The number of operations in object storage, sliced by instance, and whether they have succeeded.                     | Count        | 1 m         | node_name success_label              |
| obj_storage_used_capacity_bytes                                     | obj_storage_used_capacity_bytes                                     | obj_storage_used_capacity_bytes  | obj_storage_used_capacity_bytes  | obj_storage_used_capacity_bytes            |
| The number of bytes of stored data, sliced by instance.                               | The number of bytes of stored data, sliced by instance.                               | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
| obj_storage_available_capacity_bytes                                    | obj_storage_available_capacity_bytes                                    | obj_storage_available_capacity_bytes | obj_storage_available_capacity_bytes | obj_storage_available_capacity_bytes           |
| The number of bytes of remaining available storage, sliced by instance.                           | The number of bytes of remaining available storage, sliced by instance.                           | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
| metering_obj_used_capacity_bytes                                     | metering_obj_used_capacity_bytes                                     | metering_obj_used_capacity_bytes  | metering_obj_used_capacity_bytes  | metering_obj_used_capacity_bytes            |
| The number of bytes of consumed capacity, sliced by tenant.                              | The number of bytes of consumed capacity, sliced by tenant.                              | Gauge        | 1 m         | objectstorage_tenant_id tenant_type sku_id sku_name organization    |
| obj_storage_status                                         | obj_storage_status                                         | obj_storage_status     | obj_storage_status     | obj_storage_status                |
| The status of storage services, sliced by instance. Attribute values are: 0 = No Errors, 10 = In Transition, 20 = Insufficient Free Space, 30 = Volume(s) Unavailable, 40 = Error. | The status of storage services, sliced by instance. Attribute values are: 0 = No Errors, 10 = In Transition, 20 = Insufficient Free Space, 30 = Volume(s) Unavailable, 40 = Error. | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
| obj_appliance_failed_disks                                       | obj_appliance_failed_disks                                       | obj_appliance_failed_disks   | obj_appliance_failed_disks   | obj_appliance_failed_disks              |
| The number of drives that are not optimal in storage appliance, sliced by instance.                        | The number of drives that are not optimal in storage appliance, sliced by instance.                        | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
| obj_storage_auditlog_fs_size_bytes                                     | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_size_bytes                                     | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_size_bytes | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_size_bytes | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_size_bytes            |
| The size of the audit log file system drive in bytes.                                | The size of the audit log file system drive in bytes.                                | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
| obj_storage_auditlog_fs_avail_bytes                                    | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_avail_bytes                                    | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_avail_bytes | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_avail_bytes | obj_storage_auditlog_fs_avail_bytes           |
| The available size left in bytes for the audit log file system drive.                            | The available size left in bytes for the audit log file system drive.                            | Gauge        | 1 m         | node_name                  |
